page.title: 04Clubs
page.content: GHGThere are many clubs in the village of Glinton.Cubs,Guides,Scouts and Brownies take up alot of them. CUBS The Cubs are run by Mrs.Giles.They meet on a Friday night at the local Secondary School.They do various activities such as,going on camp,going swimming and earning badges for their uniform. SCOUTS The Scouts are a similar organisation to the Cubs but are of an older age group.Mr.Pummell & Mr.Watkin run the Scouts.They go on a lot of hikes and often camp out. BROWNIES Brownies also meet at the Secondary School.The Brown Owl organises the Brownies.Mrs.tribe runs the Brownies on a Tuesday night. T
